thread.title: Report: Hillary Clinton Is Considering Running For Mayor Of New York City
thread.title_full: Report: Hillary Clinton Is Considering Running For Mayor Of New York City

author: Kaitlan Collins
title: Report: Hillary Clinton Is Considering Running For Mayor Of New York City
text:
Hillary Clinton is considering running for mayor of New York City, a new report claims. (Photo: Getty Images) 
According to TMZ, someone who was at “a gathering” with the failed presidential candidate and other “politically connected people” last month said she “has not ruled it out and is taking a real look at it.” 
“Hillary says the people in the room were supportive of a run, and she said she was talking to people in her close circle to gauge the level of interest and support in a Clinton candidacy,” the source told TMZ. “Judging from the meeting, so far it’s just talk.” (Photo: Justin Sullivan/Getty Images) 
In January, Politico reported that Clinton was being briefed by her former manager on what went wrong with her campaign during the election. 
“She understands that a forensic exam of the campaign is necessary, not only for her, but for the party and other electeds, and for the investors in the campaign,” a friend of Clinton’s said. “People want to know that their investment was treated with respect, but that their mistakes wouldn’t be repeated.”
